name: Dragonrider's Initiative
description:
While dragonriding at middle speed and above, you gain stacks of Dragonrider's Initiative, up to 10.

When landing at mid-to-high speeds, you create a shockwave, damaging enemies for 397 per stack, split among them, and disorienting them for 3 sec. Landing at low speeds cancels Dragonrider's Initiative.
